Package chainParticipants

Class ChainParticipant

  • java.lang.Object
    • chainParticipants.ChainParticipant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Party
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Customer, Farmer, Manufacturer, Retailer, Seller, Storehouse
    public abstract class ChainParticipant
extends java.lang.Object
implements Party
    An abstract class describes the general state and behavior of a participant in a chain, including operations such as accepting a product, fulfilling a request, accepting payment, and others.
